thread.section_title: Bigboxcars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bigboxcars | bigboxcars.com.au
thread.title: Madelon Caruana

author: Madelon Caruana
title: Madelon Caruana
text:
Thanks Dennis, I am very happy with the way your dealership looks after their clients. No hassling about price, which is good, and I cant believe all the extras you done for me to make me a happy customer.
I will absolutely refer people to BigBoxcars. and If I need another car i will come back here.
I live one hour away from the garage, but they picked me up from home in order for me to pick the car up that I bought.
I found them very trustworthy, reliable and friendly.
